document_data.caption: A harpsichord from [[Aurora's Emporium]].
document_data.name: Harpsichord
document_data.mainbody: A '''harpsichord''' was a large keyboard instrument.
document_data.Description:
Harpsichords were popular in manors and castles alike. They were versatile instruments that could be played by one or two players and could provide a variety of moods, from cheerful to pensive.

Harpsichords crafted by a [[gnome|gnomish]] master from [[Selgaunt]] could be special-ordered through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]''. Prices varied depending on materials, so each order was individualized.
document_data.Notable Users: * The [[Bendekar's Mercantile]] storehouse in [[Ravens Bluff]] had a harpsichord in their instruments collection.<ref>{{Cite polyhedron/98/A Handful of Dust|16}}
